content.value:
Fegali Hotel is located in the heart of the historical city, close to the Cathedral, museums, main squares, surrounded by historical and contemporary monuments of famous artists. We are in the middle of the Getsemaní neighborhood, the oldest one in our beloved heroic city of Cartagena de Indias, only 200 meters from the Clock tower. Having a variety of cafes, bars and restaurants with a cosmopolitan cuisine, Plaza de la Trinidad where the independence was announced in 1811 on November 11, date in which the city declared its absolute independence from Spain. Also, we are only 10 minutes by taxi from Rafael Núñez International Airport.

Our rooms have high performance AC, bathroom with hot water, TV with more than 100 channels, nice white linen and comfortable mattress for a good and relaxing rest. We are a boutique hotel with items for sale in all our areas which makes it a unique hotel. We offer a varied and delicious breakfast from 7.30 to 9.30 am.

Set 1 block from the bay, Hotel Fegali Art Boutique offers accommodation in Cartagena de Indias. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. A complimentary breakfast is served daily.
Rooms at Hotel Fegali Art Boutique are fitted with a private bathroom, a TV, air-conditioning and a dining area. A daily maid service is included.
Hotel Fegali Art Boutique features a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk.
Babysitting and laundry services are available at an extra fee.
Cartagena's Gold Museum is 700 m from Hotel Fegali Art Boutique, while Palace of the Inquisition is 800 m away.

description.description: Hotel Fegali is your home in Cartagena. it offers you a good rest in comfortable rooms, after intense days of tourism or a long day of congress in the convention center of Cartagena which is only 100 meters away, allowing you to make the most of your time by staying with us. We can also help you organize reliable and safe tours at special prices.
